_source.text: 1. WR - Unless a guy like Lee falls, guys like Davante Adams, Allen Robinson and Jordan Matthews are really no different than guys like Mike Davis and Cody Hoffman - and I personally like Davis and Hoffman a lot better than those guys anyway.

text: are really no different than guys like **Mike** **Davis** and Cody Hoffman - and I personally like Davis and Hoffman a lot **better** **than** those guys anyway.
